thread.title: GitLab: Buy This Rule Of 40 Software Growth Story As It Hits Profit Inflection
thread.title_full: GitLab: Buy This Rule Of 40 Software Growth Story As It Hits Profit Inflection

author: Gary Alexander
title: GitLab: Buy This Rule Of 40 Software Growth Story As It Hits Profit Inflection
text:
Investors who still want to be exposed to growth in 2025, yet are worried about rising valuations in a potentially correction-prone market, have tough choices to make this year. In my view, the field of buyable stocks is narrow, as
GitLab: Buy This Rule Of 40 Software Growth Story As It Hits Profit Inflection
Summary
- GitLab is a fantastic “growth at a reasonable price” stock, trading at <10x revenue despite 30%+ revenue growth.
- The company is also a “Rule of 40” stock and trades below other peers like Atlassian with a similar financial profile.
- The company addresses a massive $40 billion market and is benefiting from companies ripping out siloed solutions for GitLab’s integrated approach.
- Operating margins recently hit double-digits after expanding 10 points y/y, with the company positioned to generate meaningful profit growth in 2025.
Analyst’s Disclosure: I/we have a beneficial long position in the shares of GTLB either through stock ownership, options, or other derivatives. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article.
